sys_script.name: Ratelock: Create Ratesheets

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_006a42ca1b4e8c5048a242e58d4bcb20
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_momo_ratelock_ticket</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_momo_ratelock_ticket">loan_numberISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="loan_number" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Ratelock: Create Ratesheets</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
  var VALID_FILE_EXTENSIONS = [
    '.csv',
    '.pdf',
    '.xls',
    '.docx'
  ];

  var __attachments = getAttachments();

  createRateSheet(__attachments);

  function getAttachments() {
    var attachment = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
    attachment.addQuery('table_sys_id', current.getUniqueValue());
    attachment.addQuery('table_name', current.getTableName());
    var qc = attachment.addQuery('file_name', 'ENDSWITH', '.xlsx');
    VALID_FILE_EXTENSIONS.forEach(function(extension) {
      qc.addOrCondition('file_name', 'ENDSWITH', extension);
    });
    attachment.query();

    return attachment.next();
  }

  function createRateSheet(has_next) {
    if (!has_next) return;
    var sheet = new GlideRecord('x_momo_ratelock_ratesheet');
    sheet.initialize();
    sheet.insert();
	gs.error('Ratesheet' + sheet.getUniqueValue());
    var sys_attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();
    sys_attachment.copy(current.getTableName(), current.getUniqueValue(), sheet.getTableName(), sheet.getUniqueValue());
    var _attachment = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
    _attachment.addQuery('table_sys_id', sheet.getUniqueValue());
    _attachment.addQuery('table_name', sheet.getTableName());
    var qc = _attachment.addQuery('file_name', 'ENDSWITH', '.xlsx');
    VALID_FILE_EXTENSIONS.forEach(function(extension) {
      qc.addOrCondition('file_name', 'ENDSWITH', extension);
    });
    _attachment.query();
    _attachment.deleteMultiple();
  }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-01 12:28:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>006a42ca1b4e8c5048a242e58d4bcb20</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Ratelock: Create Ratesheets</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ratelock" source="x_momo_ratelock">605affb71badc01048a242e58d4bcb76</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Ratelock">605affb71badc01048a242e58d4bcb76</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_006a42ca1b4e8c5048a242e58d4bcb20</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-01 12:39:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=006a42ca1b4e8c5048a242e58d4bcb20"/></record_update>
